name: Sensitive Landscapes
description:
We decided to create an experience for us to relax from these difficult times. Maybe you want a short break while studying or use it as a cathartic opportunity to let your thoughts flow.

While developing Sensitive Landscapes one of our team members came across with the idea of adding an optional narrative about an existential crisis. 

We also believe some games can heal <3

An experience by Sebastián Blanco, Guido Gallego, Juan Ignacio Plou, Pedro Vázquez and Gastón Williner. We recommend playing it alone with headphones and low light.
